snippet: The nation’s first known legal recreational marijuana club has already closed — because of a landlord dispute.
abstract: White Horse Inn in Del Norte, Colorado, nation's first known legal recreational marijuana club, closes day after its opening due to landlord dispute.
lead_paragraph: The nation’s first known legal recreational marijuana club has already closed — because of a landlord dispute.

headline.main: Colorado: First Marijuana Club Breaks Ground, but Closes a Day Later
headline.print_headline: Colorado: First Marijuana Club Breaks Ground, but Closes a Day Later
